naslov: Pirovac, velebna kuća u prirodi s bazenom, 161 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: *** kratkotrajna ponuda, bez namještaja i uređaja *** Prekrasna jednoetažna kuća za odmor u pitoresknom selu Putičanje kraj Pirovca, savršen spoj tradicionalne dalmatinske baštine i suvremene arhitekture s naglaskom na pružanju svega potrebnog za obiteljski život i boravak, odnosno odmor i relaksaciju. Sastoji se od dva zasebna i samodostatna objekta, jedan je stara kamena kuća koja je od temelja do krova kompletno i brižno obnovljena i sada doslovno blista u punom sjaju. Pokraj nje je izgrađen posve novi i moderan stambeni objekt. Svaka od dviju građevina ima svoj zaseban ulaz, no međusobno su spojene preko zatvorene i uređene verande pa je moguć i direktan pristup iz jednog u drugi objekt. Nekretnina je izdašno opremljena, baš po mjeri čovjeka te nudi 161 m2 bruto stambenog prostora. Idealna je za boravak dviju obitelji odnosno prijatelja i rodbine koji imaju dva objekta za odsjesti te zimski vrt u kojem mogu uživati zajedno. Svaka kuća objedinjuje raskošnu i potpuno opremljenu kuhinju (s ventilacijom na van) kombiniranu s dnevnim boravkom i blagovaonicom, dvije spavaće sobe (sve prostorije krasi poseban ambijent s povišenim stropom) i kupaonicu. Nova kuća sadrži i dodatni WC. Vani se prostire pergolom natkriveno i nenatkriveno sunčalište s ležaljkama uz neodoljiv grijani bazen, a tu je i igralište za sportove s loptom, dječje igralište, prostrana nadstrešnica za tri vozila (uz poprilično nenatkrivenog prostora za dodatna vozila), te jedna velika i jedna manja ostava. Svaki komadić slobodnog prostora oko rezidencije tvori jedan pozamašan, brižljivo zasađen i pomno održavan vrt, kojeg krase pregršt stabala i ukrasnog raslinja, uključujući mnoštvo oleandara, dva iznimno rodna badema, masline, šipak, palme i lavandu, a tu je i velebni čempres uz samu ogradu. Uređeni vrt se nadovezuje i proteže i s vanjske strane ograde uz samu cestu, stvarajući tako jedno posebno ozračje i doživljaj boravka u prostoru. Voda za navodnjavanje je provedena po cijelom terenu s mogućnošću više priključaka crijeva po želji. Tu su klima uređaji u svakoj sobi, prvoklasne kupaonice s Grohe opremom i upravo renoviranim tuš kabinama, kvalitetna PVC stolarija uz specijalna okna koja ne propuštaju sunčevu toplinu, komarnici na svim prozorima i vratima, tri tende, vrtne garniture, zidani roštilj, vanjski tuš, bežični internet, satelitska i zemaljska televizija, podovi popločeni s izvrsnim keramičkim i laminatnim pločicama, posebna drvena stolarija rađena po mjeri za obnovljenu kuću, video nadzor, vanjska rasvjeta na senzore, dvije kapije od lijevanog željeza na daljinsko upravljanje, roletne u novoj kući te tradicionalne škure u obnovljenoj kući. Tu je i bezbroj raznih zanimljivih i praktičnih detalja, dodataka, rekvizita, dekoracija i aparata, baš kako i doliči vili koja je izričito i s puno ljubavi građena za vlasnika i obitelj. Nekretnina je u cijelosti ograđena kombinacijom betonskog zida i metalne ograde, upotpunjenih elegantnim stupovima i dekorativnim kapama. Osim čisto estetskog doživljaja i vrijednosti, izvedena ograda nudi i dodatnu dozu sigurnosti i privatnosti. Rezidencija uživa smještaj u jednoj vrlo mirnoj, pitomoj i idiličnoj sredini okruženoj prekrasnim zelenim krajolikom. S jedne strane je odvojena od urbane vreve, buke i gužvi, a s druge strane je doista nedaleko od svih bitnih sadržaja. Iznimno je dobro prometno povezana, s direktnim i pravocrtnim izlazom prema moru i okolnim mjestima, na 10 min je od mora i plaže u Pirovcu, 15 min od Vodica, 25 min od Nacionalnog parka Krka i 35 min od Zadarskog aerodroma. Sve u nekretnini je sasvim novo i besprijekorno u funkciji, sagrađeno da traje i pruži sve što je potrebno jednoj ili dvije obitelji. Tko god dođe u posjetu neće požaliti, rezidencija ima srce i dušu te naprosto odiše jednim posebnim šarmom pa je gotovo je nemoguće ostati ravnodušan, odnosno ne zaljubiti se na prvi pogled. --- A beautiful one-story holiday house in picturesque village of Putičanje near Pirovac, a perfect combination of traditional Dalmatian heritage and contemporary architecture with an emphasis on providing everything necessary for family life and stay, for rest and relaxation. It consists of two separate and self-sufficient buildings, one is an old stone house that has been completely and studiously renovated from the ground up and now literally radiates in its full glory. A completely new and modern residential building was built next to it. Each one of the two buildings has its own separate entrance, but they are also connected to each other via a closed and appointed veranda, so a direct access from one to the other is possible. The property is generously equipped, exactly to a man’s standards. It is ideal for the stay of two families, or friends and relatives who have two houses to reside in and a winter garden which they can enjoy together. Each house entails a luxurious and fully equipped kitchen (with ventilation to the outside) combined with living room and dining room, two bedrooms (all rooms feature special ambience with raised ceiling) and a bathroom. The new house also contains an additional toilet. On the outside, there is a pergola-covered and uncovered sunbathing area with deck chairs next to an irresistible heated swimming pool, and there is also a ball sports field, a children’s playground, a spacious carport for three vehicles (with plenty of uncovered space for additional vehicles), and one large and one small storage room. Every inch of free space around the residence combines into a large, carefully planted and meticulously maintained garden, which is adorned with a handful of trees and ornamental plants, including many oleanders, two exceptionally fertile almonds, olives, pomegranates, palms and lavender, and there is also a magnificent cypress tree next to the the fence. The landscaped garden extends beyond the fence along the adjacent road, thus creating a special atmosphere and experience of staying in the space. Irrigation water is laid down throughout the garden with several options of connecting a hose if desired. There are air conditioning units in each room, first-class bathrooms with Grohe equipment with newly renovated shower cabins, high-quality PVC carpentry with special windows that block the sun’s heat from getting through, mosquito nets on all windows and doors, three awnings, garden furniture sets, brick barbecue, outdoor shower, wireless Internet, satellite and terrestrial television, floors tiled with excellent ceramic and laminate tiles, special wooden carpentry made to measure for the renovated house, video surveillance, outdoor lighting with sensors, two remotely controlled cast iron gates, blinds in the new house and traditional sheds in the renovated house. There are also countless interesting and practical details, accessories, props, decorations and appliances, just as befits a villa that was expressly and lovingly built for the owner and his family. The property is completely fenced with a combination of concrete wall and metal fence, complemented with elegant columns and decorative caps. Besides the purely aesthetic experience and value, the constructed fence also offers an additional dose of security and privacy. The residence enjoys being located in a very peaceful, serene and idyllic environment surrounded by beautiful green landscape. On one hand, it is separated from the urban bustle, noise and crowds, and on the other hand, it is indeed quite near all important facilities. It is extremely well road connected, with direct and straightforward access to the sea and surrounding places: it is 10 minutes drive from the sea and the beach in Pirovac, 15 minutes from Vodice, 25 minutes from Krka National Park and 35 minutes from Zadar Airport. Everything in the property is brand new and in perfect working order, built to last and to provide everything needed by one or two families. Whoever comes to visit will not regret it, the residence has a heart and soul and simply exudes a special charm, so it is almost impossible to remain indifferent, that is, not to fall in love at first sight.
